channel.title: Godwar's boss help
channel.description:
Ok I don't know if this would be a server sided or client sided problem since there are too solutions people have posted which I don't understand, Okay so I was trying to add these:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429358.0.html
I added all 4 kind of successfully They all appear animated but only for standing and walking, When they attack me they turn invisible, so I read through that topic a little to find answers 2 people said that we have to edit there animations in Npchandler.Java which I don't get at all the other solution was to readd the models and ints and animations but that's obviously not my problem here since they all load fine so if someone could explain to me what I have to do exactly in NpcHandler.Java that'd be great I will Rep++

item.title: Godwar's boss help
item.dc:creator: @i_hollowfied i_hollowfied
item.description:
@i_hollowfied wrote:

Ok I don’t know if this would be a server sided or client sided problem since there are too solutions people have posted which I don’t understand, Okay so I was trying to add these:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I added all 4 kind of successfully They all appear animated but only for standing and walking, When they attack me they turn invisible, so I read through that topic a little to find answers 2 people said that we have to edit there animations in Npchandler.Java which I don’t get at all the other solution was to readd the models and ints and animations but that’s obviously not my problem here since they all load fine so if someone could explain to me what I have to do exactly in NpcHandler.Java that’d be great I will Rep++
